description: I will come to your place to change strings of any guitar. E.g: Acoustic, Electric, Bass. You can buy the strings beforehand, but if you need me to buy the string, then the string cost will be added with the service charge.

reviews.reviewText: Got to appreciate his punctual, organized, and efficient way of work
Loved his careful way of handling the client's instrument. I can guarantee you a service worth your money!

serviceName: Floyd Rose Guitar Tuning/ String Change
description: You can bring your guitar to my store or I can come to your place to tune your guitar. I can also teach you on the first time I do it, so that you won't need my help the next time.

reviews.reviewText: Got to appreciate his punctual, organized, and efficient way of work
Loved his careful way of handling the client's instrument. I can guarantee you a service worth your money!

description: You have bring your guitar to my store to avail this service, as the tools required for this task cannot be carried out. You can choose out of 3 types of alignment options.
